short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple calculator for your investment/savings/dividend returns

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easy to use calculator for rough interest yields or costs.

Can be used for working out rough dividend returns, mortgage costs, savings interest etc.
 
Three currencies to choose from, GBP, Dollar, Euro.
Input your investment amount and the percentage return/cost.
Times the interest by 1-10 years and see the changes due to compounding.

This simple calculator does not take into account real world scenarious, and merely works out a percentage of a value based on your input.

Happy calculating!
